text: De Mars is a hamlet in the Dutch province of Gelderland. It is a part of the municipality of Buren, and lies about 8 km south of Veenendaal. The area belonging to De Mars was originally located north of the Rhine river. However, the river bed now runs along a new route north of De Mars. The statistical area "De Mars", which also can include the surrounding countryside, has an approximate population of 270.Statistics Netherlands (CBS), Statline: Kerncijfers wijken en buurten 2003-2005 . As of 1 January 2005. ==References== Category:Populated places in Gelderland Category:Buren
title: De Mars, Gelderland
